WorkItem.Description: Please add some samples for using Bing. I would specifically like to see a sample that shows a map that is getting address data from a sharepoint Contact list.

Comments.Message:
Hello dlgross, 

Thank you for using our free Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework Sample Request Service!   

Your sample request is about how to use Bing.  If I misunderstood your requirement, please feel free to let me know. 

We want to know which technology you need to use the Bing in. WPF? SilverLight? Windows Phone?
